The Docket: Standard Services

Missing Persons & Entities

Lost a spouse in a temporal rift? Misplaced a sentient nebula? We track quarry across dimensions. Standard temporal displacement waiver applies.

Corporate Espionage

Rivals steal your toast-buttering algorithm? We navigate data-seas and corporate fortresses. Discretion is paramount. And expensive.

Existential Crises

Are you the dream of a slumbering god-fragment? For a modest fee, we provide a binding, notarized answer. Peace of mind is extra.

Paranormal Pest Control

Poltergeists rearranging your furniture? A black hole in your living room? We offer humane (and not-so-humane) entity relocation services.

Petty Grievances

Neighbor's gravity-scooter parked over your designated wormhole? We handle it. With prejudice. No case too small, no grudge too petty.

Memory Retrieval

Forgot the name of your first pet or the fundamental constants of the universe? We access Akashic and server-based records. Results may vary.

Frequently Transmitted Queries

You're a goldfish. How do you do anything?

My disappointment in your lack of imagination is immeasurable. I have a cyber-neural vocoder and an assistant, a bipedal ape of surprising competence who handles the manual labor. I handle the thinking. Next question.

What are your qualifications?

I have stared into the unfiltered abyss between galaxies. I charted the fall of the Cygnus X-1 empire and personally witnessed the Great Filter. Your stolen data chip does not intimidate me.

Is my case too small for you?

The universe is built on small things. Atoms, quarks, petty slights. Send the case file. The Commodore will be the judge of its cosmic significance.

What if my problem is me?

That is the only problem worth solving. Our Existential Crisis package is quite popular. See "The Tithe" for pricing. Be warned: enlightenment is not cheap.
